overview:
Kevin Halter is the VP of Sales and co-Founder of Rentcycle.

Kevin is passionate about people and his relationships with customers, colleagues, friends and family. Kevin has always been interested in improving the lives of others through innovation. Kevin is interested in utilizing the web to save people time and money, so they have more of both to spend with their families. Kevin is interested in using the web to improve efficiencies and increase transparency in markets, which have been resistant to change.

Prior to Rentcycle, Kevin worked for Pfizer Pharmaceuticals in their Institutional Sales and Community Sales Divisions.

Kevin earned his Bachelor of Science in Engineering from Tufts University.

Kevin’s enjoys anything outdoors. He loves to cycle, run, swim, kayak, hike, scuba dive, ski, and go camping, which he does throughout Northern California.
